original_text: You should not be so proud of yourselves. Think about what yeast does in bread. A very small amount of yeast changes the whole loaf of bread.
korean_text: 너희가 자랑하는 것이 옳지 아니하도다 적은 누룩이 온 덩어리에 퍼지는 것을 알지 못하느냐

sentences.original_text: You should not be so proud of yourselves.
sentences.korean_translation: 너희는 그렇게 스스로를 자랑해서는 안 된다.

sentences.original_text: Think about what yeast does in bread.
sentences.korean_translation: 누룩이 빵 속에서 하는 일을 생각해 보아라.

sentences.original_text: A very small amount of yeast
changes the whole loaf of bread.
